Envisioned as a holistic living experience, KAIA is more than just a housing project – it is a comprehensive lifestyle destination meticulously designed for our residents.  Our coastal development offers diverse amenities to cater to every aspect of our residents’ lives. Enjoy a fine dining experience at our restaurant or relax at the pool bar. Find productivity and collaboration in our co-working spaces, or immerse yourself in nature within our community gardens. Access our sandy beach, marvel at the view from our scenic platform, or explore our walking and cycling paths. Prioritize well-being at our yoga & fitness studio, spa, sauna, and hot tubs, or let your children delight in our dedicated play areas. With KAIA, every day is a unique experience.

Amenities & Activities

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Immerse yourself in the enriching experiences that Kaia offers, where an array of top-tier amenities and activities seamlessly blend with our commitment to sustainability and community well-being.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:17px|text_align:left|line_height:1.7em” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”none”]
  • Restaurant and Pool Bar
  • Coworking Spaces
  • Community Gardens
  • Sandy Beach Access
  • Scenery Viewing Platform
  • Walking and Cycling Paths
  • Yoga & Fitness Studio
  • Spa, Sauna, Outdoor Hot Tubs
  • Hammam & Steam Room
  • Children’s Pool & Playground
  • Beach Entry Pool
  • Minimarket

Active Concept

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Kaia offers an appealing blend of nature, smart living, and unique experiences for various needs.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:17px|text_align:left|line_height:1.7em” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”none”]
  • Professionals enjoy work-life balance with tranquil workspaces.
  • Experience Collectors find rich local interactions and attractions.
  • Families benefit from varied housing sizes and abundant family-friendly facilities.
  • Seniors are catered with convenience oriented designs and engaging activities.
[vc_custom_heading text=”All enjoy Kaia’s personalized well-being oriented lifestyle practices, harmonized with the island’s natural beauty.” Fine Dining
